articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates German President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates German President
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of congratulations to Christian Wulff upon his election as president of Germany.
					 Kim in the message wished him success in his work for the economic stability and sustained development of the country.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Refutes Declaration of G-8 Summit
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Refutes Declaration of G-8 Summit
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The declaration adopted at the Canada G-8 summit criticized the DPRK, linking it with the "Cheonan" case.
					 This can not but be an unjust and arbitrary practice openly perpetrated by the G-8 against the DPRK, dancing to the tune of the United States. 
					
					 The declaration pulled up the DPRK, though indirectly, referring to south Korea's "results of investigation" into the "Cheonan" case. This is an insult to the DPRK.
					
					 The results are beset with doubts and contradictions. Heads of state of G-8, however, hastily handled the case in a deliberate manner only to prove that they sought a sinister political purpose.
					
					 A touch-and-go situation is now prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have been completely cut off and the situation is inching close to a war phase. It is highly regretful that the G-8 summit played into the hands of specified forces at this sensitive moment, serving as a tool for attaining their political purpose while paying no heed to regional and world stability. 
					
					 The DPRK flatly rejects the declaration as a clumsy hackwork which admits of no argument.
					
					 What is of paramount importance at present is to pay primary attention to objectively probing the truth behind the case of warship sinking in face of the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices and make correct judgment favorable for peace and stability of the region.
					
					 Should some forces persist in their anti-DPRK moves as evidenced by the G-8's hasty adoption of the declaration critical of the DPRK based on unilateral "results of investigation", not on objective confirmation of the truth, they will have to bear full responsibility for the ensuing consequences.
					
					 It is a pipe dream of a fool to try to shift the responsibility for the case of warship sinking on to the DPRK and put international pressure upon it.

articles.title: Russian Dance Company Performs in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Russian Dance Company Performs in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia on a visit to the DPRK gave a performance at the East Pyongyang Grand Theater on Friday.
					 Appreciating the performance were Minister of Culture An Tong Chun, Vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Hong Son Ok who doubles as chairwoman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, creators and artistes in the field of literature and arts, reporters and editors in the field of mass media and working people in the city. Charge d'Affaires ad interim Alexander Matsegora and his embassy officials were also among the audience.
					
					 The performers vividly represented the ardent patriotism of the Russian army and people and their optimistic life in Russian dance "Venzelya", fleet dance suite "A Day on Warship" and other pieces.
					
					 Artistes truthfully presented folk dances of different countries with high ensemble, talented choreography and enthusiastic and dynamic rhythms in Azerbaijan dance "Herd Boys", Ukrainian dance "Gopak-Kolo" and other numbers.
					
					 They also put on the stage the Korean folk dance "Trio Dance".
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Lao Embassies Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Lao Embassies Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Chaleune Warinthrasak and staff members of the Lao embassy here did a friendly work on the DPRK-Laos Friendship Taewon Vegetable Cooperative Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang, on Friday.
					 They helped the farmers in threshing wheat.
					
					 The Lao embassy officials handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Society for Rallying Comrades
articles.content:
Society for Rallying Comrades
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- July 3 is the 80th anniversary of the formation of the Society for Rallying Comrades, the first revolutionary party organization in Korea.
					 On this occasion, the Korean people are recollecting the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in creating a brilliant example in founding a Juche-type revolutionary party in his teens on the basis of the historic truth that the party plays the role of the general staff in the revolution and that victory in the revolution depends on the role of the party,.
					
					 He chose a new road in formulating the principles and mode of party founding and explored a new way of preparing hard-core leading members and the mass foundation. He, with ceaseless thinking and revolutionary practice, set forth a unique policy of founding a party not from top level but from lower level with the formation of a basic party organization. A day after the Kalun meeting, he formed the Society for Rallying Comrades.
					
					 The name of the organization embodies the high aims and will of the President, who was taking the first step in the revolution by winning over comrades, and who was determined to develop the revolution and achieve its final victory by continually mustering and rallying comrades who would share the same fate with him.
					
					 He wrote in his reminiscences "With the Century", "We felt the urge to fire big guns, not just pistols, in commemoration of the formation of the first party organization".
					
					 The first party organization, the embryo and seed of the Workers' Party of Korea, served as the parent body in forming and expanding the basic organizations of the party.

articles.title: S. Korea's Re-dispatch of Troops to Afghanistan Accused
articles.content:
S. Korea's Re-dispatch of Troops to Afghanistan Accused
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korea puppet forces' renewed moves to dispatch troops to Afghanistan entered the phase of full-scale implementation. They sent an advance group there a few days ago according to its plan to dispatch a unit to Afghanistan early in July.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes that this is another intolerable act of treachery which can be committed only by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors steeped in sycophancy toward the U.S. and submission to foreign forces to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 The puppet forces did not hide their plan to squander at random the money collected from the people as "official development fund for Afghanistan" and spend "additional fund" to this end. This is not aimed at the "reconstruction" of Afghanistan as touted by them but to financially back the U.S. war of aggression against Afghanistan, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean conservative group rolled up its sleeves to play a role of a shock brigade in executing the U.S. war against Afghanistan in order to get its master's backing and favor and thus stay in power and pursue its treacherous policy.
					
					 It is its sinister intention to realize its political ambition utterly indifferent to the deaths of young and middle-aged south Koreans in battlefields of the U.S. imperialists' war of aggression.
					
					 Enormous are disaster and pain the south Koreans are suffering due to the group of traitors.
					
					 No one can vouch that the group would not force all the south Koreans to fall victims to the U.S. imperialists' nuclear war as it did not hesitate to fake up the anti-DPRK conspiratorial farce with the U.S. even sacrificing 46 soldiers of the puppet army.

articles.title: GNP's Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Assailed
articles.content:
GNP's Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Assailed
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The group of the Grand National Party of south Korea rammed a "resolution critical of the north" over sinking case of warship "Cheonan" through the full-dress "National Assembly" session on June 29 in the wake of railroading it through the "NA Defence Commission". The conservative group in the "resolution" talked about "violation" and "provocation", again asserting that the warship was sunk by a "torpedo attack" of the north. It went the lengths of crying out for "apology", "punishment" and "reparation" from someone while demanding the authorities and the international community take "tough countermeasures" and make "close international cooperation".
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 With the passage the Lee Myung Bak group completely legalized and systematized fratricidal confrontation and pushed the situation to a more extreme phase under the pretext of the tricky case.
					
					 The passage of the "resolution" through the puppet NA session is nothing but a dirty farce to breathe new life into its worn-out conspiratorial racket and save the plummeted honor of plot-breeders.
					
					 The puppet group made itself busy referring the "results of investigation" to countries around the Korean Peninsula and the UN only to be snubbed and get the cold shoulder. To make things worse, local voices demanding comprehensive reinvestigation into the case and an "inspection of the state administration" are growing, troubling the conservative group.
					
					 The GNP group's carriage of the "resolution" through the NA is nothing but a desperate last-ditch effort of those much upset by the disclosure of the truth about the case.
					
					 The Lee group should not run amuck, clearly understanding that its extreme confrontation racket is a self-suicidal act of accelerating their shameful end.

articles.title: Elimination of Traitors Called for
articles.content:
Elimination of Traitors Called for
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The lesson drawn from the last Korean War which caused huge losses and disaster to the Korean nation is that the tragic disaster of the nation is unavoidable unless the stooges of the aggressors and war servants of foreign forces are eliminated from the nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The Syngman Rhee puppet clique, which took power taking the advantage of the U.S. imperialists' moves for "separate election and separate government" in south Korea after the liberation of Korea, desperately tried to provoke a war, while rejecting the just and above-board proposal repeatedly raised by the DPRK to achieve national reunification by peaceful means, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The Syngman Rhee puppet clique is, indeed, a group of despicable war servants of the U.S. imperialists and a group of traitors who can never be pardoned as it did not hesitate to push the fellow countrymen into the disaster of war for its own luxury. 
					
					 There appeared in south Korea another group of traitors running amuck to do harm to fellow countrymen in collusion with the aggressors as traitor Syngman Rhee did in the present June 15 era of reunification. It is the Lee Myung Bak group.
					
					 The conservative group in south Korea are running wild to provoke another war in conspiracy with the U.S. imperialists, destroying peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The war-like forces of the south Korean military have rounded off more adventurous and offensive war scenarios to invade the DPRK by "preempting an attack" on it, regarding it as the "principal enemy". They are now putting spurs to the development of ultra-modern war equipment and the arms buildup.
					
					 Not content with this, they are actively participating in the U.S.-sponsored PSI and the Missile Defense system.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is, indeed, a group of war servants of the U.S. imperialists who harass peace and stability on the peninsula and bellicose forces who can not live without war.
					
					 The reality urgently requires the Korean nation to immediately throw overboard the group of traitors so that it may not suffer from the same disaster as the last June 25 war.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Traditional Single-Minded Unity
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Traditional Single-Minded Unity
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The traditional single-minded unity in the DPRK is the most precious treasure of the Korean revolution and the ever-victorious banner for opening up a bright future of the country as it was provided in the flames of the anti-Japanese struggle and firmly carried forward century after century. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					 This single-minded unity is the unity in thinking and will based on one center and one idea and the unity of moral obligation based on the revolutionary comradeship and obligation. It also represents the socio-political organism and the community linked with the same destiny in which all the servicepersons and the people share the thought, intention and destiny with their leader, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The noble tradition of the single-minded unity of the Korean revolution serves as an eternal cornerstone on which the entire army and all the people form a strong fortress for devotedly defending the leader and a powerful treasured sword for defending the independent dignity of the country and the nation and opening up a bright future of posterity. It also serves as a weapon for making a leap forward in building a thriving nation to emerge victorious. 
					
					 A key to the victory of the army and the people of the DPRK in the struggle to achieve and defend the independent sovereignty of the country against two formidable imperialisms lies in the strength of the unity. The main source that enabled the Koreans to maintain the strong independent stand and beef up the self-reliant national defence capability, winning victory after victory, also lies in the single-minded unity of the people closely rallied around the party and the leader.
					
					 Thanks to the single-minded unity in which the leader believes in the people and the people sincerely hold him in high esteem, the DPRK turned into a socialist power amid the great Chollima surge, opening up a new heyday in the era of the Workers' Party in this land amid a high-pitched speed campaign and ushering in the spectacular era of building a thriving nation to be specially recorded in the history of the nation for the past 10-odd years despite difficult conditions.
					
					 Juche iron, fiber and fertilizer are being churned out in endless streams and the Korean-style CNC technology definitely pushed back the frontiers of the latest science. This is the great victory of the single-minded unity and the precious asset which can be achieved only in the DPRK where all the people share the same thought and intention with their leader.

articles.title: S. Korea Make Excuses for Wrong "Investigation Results"
articles.content:
S. Korea Make Excuses for Wrong "Investigation Results"
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- With the daily disclosure of the scientific inaccuracy of the "investigation results" into the "Cheonan" sinking case, the puppet joint investigation team is busy reeling off a spate of poor excuses for it, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 The team backtracked from its original stand at a June 29 "briefing" attended by three media organizations including the Journalist Association.
					
					 It clarified that a very small amount of crystalline aluminum oxides were detected, too, quite contrary to its May 20 announcement of the "investigation results" that only non-crystalline aluminum oxides were found during underwater explosion test. 
					
					 It let loose a string of poor excuses, saying that "a very small amount of crystalline aluminum oxides was confirmed to be present when closely looked into the previous analysis to check if crystalline aluminum oxides were present or not."

articles.title: Fascist Suppression Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Fascist Suppression Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on June 29 to denounce the puppet group of traitors for its suppression of the organization.
					 A press release, read out at the conference, referred to the fact that the "Intelligence Service" and two companies of the police searched offices of the organization and its supporting society and houses of its core members and arrested some members of it on the charge of violation of the "National Security Law" that day.
					
					 The authorities' crackdown, as evidenced by the recent search into the Pusan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, heavy disciplinary punishment against teachers affiliated to the Teachers Union and investigation into the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society, is going to excess, it pointed out, adding that the Lee Myung Bak regime's suppression under the pretext of public security will never be allowed.
					
					 The release declared that the organization together with all the people would struggle to the last against the high-handed and violent rule of the Lee regime and get the NSL abrogated without fail to put an end to the era of barbarism.

articles.title: GNP-Introduced Anti-North Resolution Blasted
articles.content:
GNP-Introduced Anti-North Resolution Blasted
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A "resolution critical of the north" cooked up by the clan of the Grand National Party in south Korea over the case of warship "Cheonan" sinking was railroaded through the plenary session of the puppet National Assembly on June 29.
					 Ultra-right conservative elements including the clan of the GNP in this "resolution" called on the authorities and the international community to take "stern measures" against the DPRK while slandering it again.
					
					 In this regard the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea published its information bulletin No. 960 on Friday.
					
					 The bulletin says that the above-said ruckus of the GNP group was nothing but a last-ditch effort prompted by the sinister intention to deceive the people of different circles in south Korea and the international community and fan up the atmosphere of confrontation with the DPRK by announcing even in the name of the puppet National Assembly that the warship was sunk by "an attack of the north".
					
					 As a matter of fact, every page of "the results of investigation" into the case published by the puppet group is full of doubts and contradictions, it points out, and goes on to say:
					
					 The puppet National Assembly should have urged the puppet authorities to accept the DPRK's just demand before adopting what was called "resolution".
					
					 But, it engaged itself in such farce as adopting the said "resolution" to slander the DPRK. This shows that the NA of south Korea is no more than a benighted political waiting maid which does not know a hawk from a handsaw but kowtows to power, as asserted by the public opinion.
					
					 It is disgraceful and wanton challenge to justice and consciousness that the NA, which claims represents the "sacred will of the people", has zealously joined in such anti-DPRK smear campaign on the part of the U.S. and the conservative group.
					
					 No matter how hard the group of traitors may try to cover up the truth about the case, it will only bring into bolder relief its deplorable position.

articles.title: Truth about Torpedo Design Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Truth about Torpedo Design Disclosed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A person concerned of the south Korean puppet joint investigation team clarified on June 29 that the torpedo design which south Korea made public when announcing the "results of the investigation" into the case of warship sinking was not the design of torpedo CHT-02D of the north that was presumed to have attacked "Cheonan".
					 He said that the "joint investigation team" used a design of other torpedo to explain the size of a propelling body of the torpedo and positions of various parts because the design of the controversy-plagued torpedo was not available at that time. He added that some mistakes were made because time pressed them and several departments were involved in working out the results.
					
					 As already reported, when announcing the "results of the investigation" on May 20, the puppet joint investigation team claimed that it obtained the design of torpedo CHT-02D which was carried in a brochure of weapons "for export of the north." The team asserted that a propelling body of the torpedo which a civilian fishing boat "unexpectedly picked up" from the waters where "Cheonan" sank was a wreck of the "torpedo of the north" that sent the warship to the bottom of the sea because its size, shape and formation were just the same with those in the design.
					
					 Commenting on this, south Korean media clarified that it was disclosed the "investigation team" announced the "results of the investigation" based on the false information about the propelling body of the torpedo which it put forward as "crucial evidence" proving the cause of warship sinking.
					
					 They held that this has made it impossible for the authorities to dodge the public criticism denouncing them for having hurriedly announced the "results of the investigation", timed to coincide with the official starting date of "election" campaign in order to use the case of "Cheonan" for winning in the "elections to local self-governing bodies".

articles.title: Protest against Lee Myung Bak Staged by Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Protest against Lee Myung Bak Staged by Overseas Koreans
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Canada staged a demonstration against traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea outside the U.S. consulate in Toronto on June 26 and 27.
					 The demonstrators denounced the traitor for having forcibly linked the sinking case of warship "Cheonan" with the DPRK to bedevil the inter-Korean relations and aggravate the military tension of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They urged Lee Myung Bak to come out for the north-south reconciliation and cooperation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Bangladesh, a seminar, a lecture and a film show in Ethiopia and a seminar in Britain between June 16 and 19 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					The secretary general of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il as the great person who has led the WPK and the Korean people along the road of victory and glory with his distinguished leadership ability.
					
					The chiefs of the Yeka and Gulale branches of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea said that Kim Jong Il's Songun politics is the main factor that turned the DPRK into an invincible country.
					
					The chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) and other speakers stressed that Kim Jong Il is the great leader who strengthened the WPK into a party serving the people by carrying forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					They noted with high appreciation that under the guidance of Kim Jong Il, the WPK has developed into an invincible revolutionary party which achieved the unity in thought and purpose based on the idea of the leader, while rejecting all sorts of unsound ideological trends.
					
					The participants of the film show watched Korean films "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "The Tower of the Juche Idea".
					
					A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar in Britain.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Mexico
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a bulletin titled "Father of People" on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung, which carried his picture.
					 The bulletin in an article said:
					
					 It has been 16 years since Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, passed away, but the Korean people still praise him as "our leader" and "our father".
					
					 In his lifetime he always found himself among the people and shared the destiny with them, leading a common life without any distinction.
					
					 It was just the President who, when visiting countryside, would sit face to face with peasants to discuss farming and, when visiting factories, have open-hearted talk with workers, holding their greasy hands. He often dropped in at houses of working people to take warm care of their living, even opening the lid of rice-cooking pot.
					
					 Every nook and corner of Korea, from deep mountainous village to a solitary islet village, is associated with his traces of love.
					
					 To the President, the people were his beloved sons and daughters.
					
					 For the sake of those, he worked hard without having rest in red-letter days and even in his birthday.
					
					 It is natural that the Korean people called him "our leader" and "fatherly leader" and are still holding him in high esteem as the "eternal President" and the "eternal father".

articles.title: Just Cause of Korean People Supported
articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People Supported
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Organizations and personages of different countries have expressed full support for the just cause of the Korean people on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association and the Indian Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification in a joint statement on June 25 charged that the U.S. is getting more frantic in the moves to stifle the DPRK while inciting inter-Korean confrontation to realize its design for aggression with the seizure of power in south Korea by the pro-American conservative Lee Myung Bak group as a chance.
					
					 The statement expressed firm solidarity with the Korean people in the struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					 The Finland-Korea Society issued an appeal on June 24, which stressed that it is the desire of all the Korean people to live independently and peacefully in a reunified country.
					
					 The appeal called upon the Finnish people and organizations to pay deep attention to the situation of the Korean Peninsula and actively take part in the "signature campaign for supporting the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea" on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					
					 Abani Roy, secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of India, in a statement on June 25 extended support and solidarity to the just cause of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people struggling to achieve the reunification of the country independently and peacefully in the idea of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- One day in August Juche 79 (1990), President Kim Il Sung met participants in the Pan-national Rally.
					 Among them were Koreans from different regions of the world.
					
					 The President praised them as patriots devoting themselves to the cause of the country's reunification, a long-cherished desire of the nation, and warmly congratulated the participants on the Pan-national Rally held successfully thanks to their concerted efforts.
					
					 He told them that national reunification was the most urgent task and unanimous desire of all the Korean people and that there were anti-reunification forces inside and outside the nation.
					
					 Saying that the country should be reunified through the founding of the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo on the basis of the three principles of national reunification agreed upon between the north and the south, he called on the entire nation to form a broad united front to this end.
					
					 Encouraged by what he said, they were resolved to redouble their efforts for the reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il se reune con esposas de militares en grupos artisticos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il se reune con esposas de militares en grupos artisticos 
Pyongyang, 2 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente   Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea (EPC), se encontro con las miembros de grupos artisticos de esposas de militares de las unidades del EPC seleccionadas en el tercer concurso del segundo periodo de los grupos artisticos de esposas de militares del EPC y se fotografio junto a ellas.
					Al responder cordialmente a las miembros de los grupos artisticos quienes le daban aclamaciones entusiastas, envio su cordial saludo a ellas.
					
					El presente concurso demostro con claridad la justicia y la vitalidad de la orientacion del PTC en materia de literatura y arte de popularizar el arte y el orgulloso aspecto de nueva cultura creada en la epoca del Songun, senalo y se fotografio junto a las miembros de grupos artisticos evaluando altamente los meritos de ellas quienes participaron en el concurso con el extraordinario entusiasmo e hicieron gran aporte a hacer que haya rebosado en toda la sociedad el impetu revolucionario mediante un despliegue energico de funciones entre los militantes del partido, militares y trabajadores.
					
					Expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que las miembros de los grupos artisticos y otras esposas de militares defenderan como muralla de acero en el futuro tambien la linea de defensa de la patria socialista en la misma trinchera junto con sus esposos militares poniendo de pleno manifiesto el ardiente patriotismo y el espiritu revolucionario de los militares. 
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el general de ejercito del EPC U Tong Chuk, miembro del CDN de la RPDC, Ju Sang Song, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo y otros miembros directivos del ejercito e instituciones de las fuerzas armadas.

articles.title: CRPP condena a los compinches del "Gran Partido Nacional"
articles.content:
CRPP condena a los compinches del "Gran Partido Nacional"
 Pyongyang, 1 de julio (ATCC) -- En la sesion ordinaria de la Asamblea Nacional titere del Sur de Corea, convocada el 29 de junio, quedo aprobado por la fuerza el "proyecto de resolucion condenatoria al Norte" elaborado por los compinches del "Gran Partido Nacional" en relacion con el incidente de hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan".
					  En la ocasion los conservadores ultraderechistas como aquellos insistieron en que las autoridades surcoreanas y la sociedad internacional deben tomar las "medidas resueltas", al criticar otra vez a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					En su informacion no. 960 publicada en el dia primero, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) revelo que el polemico proyecto de resolucion no es mas que el esfuerzo desesperado de los compinches del "GPN" que quieren fomentar el ambiente de enfrentamiento con la RPDC enganando a los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores y de la sociedad internacional al hacer creer por conducto de la Asamblea Nacional que la corbeta "Cheonan" fue "hundida por el Norte".
					
					El "resultado de investigacion" del incidente publicado por los titeres surcoreanos es sospechoso y contradictorio desde el principio, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Antes de aprobar un "proyecto de resolucion", la Asamblea Nacional titere surcoreana debia estar al frente para hacer a las autoridades titeres aceptar la demanda justa de la RPDC.
					
					Sin embargo, apresuro por aprobar dicho proyecto acusando a la RPDC, lo cual muestra que como dice la opinion publica este organo legislativo no pasa de ser una bruta doncella politica que lisonjea al poder sin juicio. 
					
					Es una verguenza y un grave desafio a la justicia y la conciencia el que la "Asamblea Nacional", que finge representar la sagrada voluntad del pueblo, se incorpore activamente en el complot anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y la banda de conservadores surcoreanos. 
					
					Si bien esta se esfuerza en todo lo posible por ocultar la verdad del incidente del "Cheonan", terminara cayendo en el atolladero mas critico.

articles.title: No vale declaracion del G-8 sobre el caso del "Cheonan", comenta ATCC
articles.content:
No vale declaracion del G-8 sobre el caso del "Cheonan", comenta ATCC
Pyongyang, 2 de julio (ATCC) -- La declaracion de la Cumbre del G-8 recien efectuada en Canada critico aun de manera indirecta a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea vinculandola con el incidente del hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" a base del "resultado de investigacion" del Sur de Corea. 
					 Este proceder parcial que lisonjea a EE.UU. es un abierto acto arbitrario e insulto a la RPDC.
					
					Al tratar apresuradamente en contra de su voluntad el incidente del "Cheonan" tan sospechoso y contradictorio, los cabezas del G-8 se revelaron por si mismos que persiguieron un malsano objetivo politico. 
					
					 Hoy dia, la Peninsula Coreana se encuentra en la situacion tan tensa en que pueda estallar la guerra en cualquier momento. 
					
					 Las relaciones Norte-Sur de Corea se dejaron en la suspension total y la situacion llega al borde de la guerra. 
					
					 Es muy lamentable que en tal circunstancia aguda la Cumbre del G-8 se haya malempleado como un aparato para realizar el proposito politico de una fuerza especifica, sin tomar en consideracion la estabilidad regional y mundial.
					
					 La RPDC rechaza totalmente la declaracion de la Cumbre del G-8 en cuanto al incidente del "Cheonan" tomandola por un documento comercializado sin ningun valor.
					
					 En la actualidad lo mas importante es prestar la atencion primordial a aclarar de manera objetiva los verdaderos aspectos del incidente del "Cheonan" frente al despotismo y las arbitrariedades de EE.UU. y tomar el juicio correcto a favor de la paz y la estabilidad de la region. 
					
					 Si algunas fuerzas siguen recurriendo a las maniobras anti-RPDC en la palestra internacional como lo hicieron en la Cumbre del G-8 evadiendo la confirmacion objetiva sobre los verdaderos aspectos del caso del "Cheonan" y aprobando la declaracion contra la RPDC, ellas mismas se responsabilizaran enteramente de la consecuencia que emane de ello. 
					
					  Es muy ridicula la intencion de ejercer sobre la RPDC la presion internacional imputandole la responsabilidad del caso del "Cheonan".

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia nuevo envio de efectivos surcoreanos a Afganistan
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia nuevo envio de efectivos surcoreanos a Afganistan
Pyongyang, 2 de julio (ATCC) -- Las maniobras de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak encaminadas a volver a enviar a los efectivos surcoreanos a Afganistan devienen un crimen antinacional nunca tolerable para lanzar a los jovenes y adultos surcoreanos como carne de canon de las tropas norteamericanas. 
					Senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este viernes y prosigue:
					
					En estos momentos en que se aumentan los paises que retiran a sus uniformados de Afganistan, la banda de Lee Myung Bak actua con imprudencia a contrapelo de esta tendencia.
					
					La horda del traidor Lee no tiene ningun motivo de enviar a sus uniformados a Afganistan.
					
					Este juego que se desarrolla bajo el rotulo de "proteccion de civiles" causara solamente la muerte de los civiles surcoreanos en Afganistan. 
					
					El nuevo envio de uniformados a Afganistan es el producto de la naturaleza proyanqui y vendepatria de la banda de Lee Myung Bak que intenta mantener su poder ganando el apoyo y simpatia de su amo norteamericano sin hacer caso de la muerte de los soldados del ejercito titere. 
					
					Partiendo de este objetivo, la banda traidora surcoreana recurre por una parte a la confrontacion fratricida vinculando con la RPDC el incidente del hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan", complot nunca visto que resulto sepultar en el mar a los 46 soldados surcoreanos, y por la otra, acelera el criminal envio de sus efectivos a Afganistan concentrando la atencion de los habitantes en dicho incidente. 
					
					Es muy obvio el destino de los soldados del ejercito titere que van a lanzarse a Afganistan. 
					
					La nacion coreana no podra evadir el desastre si deja intacto al traidor y proyanqui Lee Myung Bak que lanza a los soldados surcoreanos a los campos de guerra de muerte.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia "proyecto de resolucion" del "GPN"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia "proyecto de resolucion" del "GPN"
Pyongyang, 2 de julio (ATCC) -- El pasado 29 de junio, la banda del "Gran Partido Nacional" del Sur de Corea aprobo en la "sesion ordinaria de la Asamblea Nacional" el llamado "proyecto de resolucion condenatoria al Norte" que fue adoptado de manera fraudulenta en la "comision de defensa" del mismo organo legislativo en relacion con el incidente de hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan".
					En el proyecto, esa camarilla de conservadores volvio a insistir en que la corbeta "Cheonan" fue hundida por el "torpedo" norcoreano, hablando de la supuesta "violacion" y "provocacion". Por otra parte, se atrevio a exigir la "excusa", "castigo" y "recompensacion" de alguien demandando a sus autoridades y la sociedad internacional que tomen "fuertes contramedidas" y mantengan la "estrecha cooperacion internacional".
					
					De esta manera, bajo el pretexto del aventurero incidente de hundimiento del "Cheonan", la banda de Lee Myung Bak llevo la situacion a la coyuntura extremada "legalizando" e institucionalizando la confrontacion fratricida con la connacional RPDC.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este viernes y continua:
					
					La aprobacion del "proyecto de resolucion" anti-RPDC en la Asamblea Nacional titere surcoreana no pasa de ser una vil farsa para activar la ya fracasada campana intrigante contra la RPDC en torno al caso del "Cheonan" y salvar el decoro de los conspiradores.
					
					Aunque los titeres realizaron muchos viajes a los paises vecinos y la ONU en su afan de recabar el apoyo a su "resultado de investigacion", no ganaron casi nada siendo desatendidos o despreciados. Para colmo, su dolor de cabeza se hizo mas grande al elevarse en el interior del Sur de Corea la voz que demanda la reinvestigacion total y la "pesquisa de las gestiones estatales".
					
					En fin de cuentas, la aprobacion del "proyecto de resolucion" contra la RPDC no pasa de ser el ultimo esfuerzo de los que temen a la revelacion de la verdad del incidente del "Cheonan".
					
					La banda de Lee Myung Bak debe actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de que su extremada campana de enfrentamiento acelerara solo su autodestruccion.
